content: In the following example, we print "Hello world!" on the screen several times. The number of times the message is printed is stored in a file named source.txt. This file should only contain a integer and should be placed in the same folder of the ConfiguredApplication class.
stemmed: In follow exampl , print `` hello world ! '' screen sever time . the number time messag print store file name source.txt . thi file contain integ place folder configuredappl class .
